name: Arena Games Platform Inc.
description: ArenaVS is an AI-native Web3 marketplace for launching, trading, and managing tokenized digital assets
one_liner: ArenaVS is an AI-native Web3 marketplace for launching, trading, and managing tokenized digital assets

name: Artwallstreet Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a non-fungible token infrastructure platform designed to make Web3 and NFTs accessible to everyone. The company's platform provides a quality user experience for anyone to familiarize themselves with the key aspects of interacting with Web3 and owning NFTs, enabling newcomers and power users to interact with interoperable platforms such as OpenSea.

The company's platform provides a quality user experience for anyone to familiarize themselves with the key aspects of interacting with Web3 and owning NFTs, enabling newcomers and power users to interact with interoperable platforms such as OpenSea.

name: BitPowr Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. The company's platform provides a modular ecosystem of critical blockchain and web3 infrastructure for businesses to build blockchain-powered products, enabling businesses and developers to a blockchain and digital assets infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain infrastructure platform intended for businesses and developers to build and scale crypto and fintech products. name: Hopae, Inc.
description: Stripe for Digital Identity. Hopae helps enterprises seamlessly integrate sophisticated wallet/eID verification systems worldwide without prior knowledge of DID technology or regulatory compliance.
one_liner: Stripe for Digital Identity. Hopae helps enterprises seamlessly integrate sophisticated wallet/eID verification systems worldwide without prior knowledge of DID technology or regulatory compliance.

name: Investacrowd Limited
description: Developer of a digital securities finance and investment platform designed to raise funds and facilitate secondary trading of technology-driven investment products. The company's platform provides the key infrastructure to digitize real assets to buy, sell, trade, borrow, or lend instantly and helps clients make intelligent investment decisions using data and technology, enabling users to reduce transaction costs and increase transparency in the private markets.
one_liner: Developer of a digital securities finance and investment platform designed to raise funds and facilitate secondary trading of technology-driven investment products. The company's platform provides the key infrastructure to digitize real assets to buy, sell, trade, borrow, or lend instantly and helps clients make intelligent investment decisions using data and technology, enabling users to reduce transaction costs and increase transparency in the private markets.

name: Lexyom, Inc.
description: Developer of an online legal platform designed to offer experienced, international, and price-predictable legal services to clients. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence technology to offer draft legal documents and offers advisory services in the areas of contracts, tax, trademarks, and investment rounds, enabling clients to have access to a secure and confidential way to get legal advice at an affordable cost.
one_liner: Developer of an online legal platform designed to offer experienced, international, and price-predictable legal services to clients. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence technology to offer draft legal documents and offers advisory services in the areas of contracts, tax, trademarks, and investment rounds, enabling clients to have access to a secure and confidential way to get legal advice at an affordable cost.

name: LifeSite, Inc.
description: Developer of an online life and family management platform designed to manage family records and documents. The company's platform combines file access and controlled, permission-based sharing with high-level document encryption and security, enabling users to get a safe and smart digital storage solution to store, organize and access the most important information in their life anytime and anywhere.

name: Pravica Incorporated
description: Developer of a communication platform designed to empower privacy. The company's platform offers a medium of secure communication using blockchain technology, enabling enterprises to communicate internally and externally in a private and secure way.
one_liner: Developer of a communication platform designed to empower privacy. The company's platform offers a medium of secure communication using blockchain technology, enabling enterprises to communicate internally and externally in a private and secure way.

name: Send4 Tecnologia Ltda.
description: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. The company's platform connects consumers to brands through interfaces in an omnichannel concept, increasing logistics and service efficiency and eliminating customer experience gaps in the process of exchanging and returning purchases, enabling retailers to offer a seamless post-purchase experience to their customers.
one_liner: Developer of a reverse logistics platform intended to simplify the process of exchange and returns for both customers and brands. name: Terminal 3 HK Limited
description: Provider of Web3 data solutions intended to protect users' privacy information. The company leverages decentralized storage and zero-knowledge proofs to allow secure information access, enabling clients to securely store their data, control its access permissions and use across applications and websites.

name: The Ticket Fairy, Inc.

name: CONTRATOSAPP S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Developer of a contract lifecycle management software intended to simplify and automate legal processes. The company's platform leverages blockchain to automate the flow of contracts including the creation, collaboration, use of electronic signatures, and monitoring, enabling financial institutions and law firms to manage, execute, and report all types of contracts feasibly.

name: Umoja Labs Corp.
description: The best and safest way to monetize your Bitcoin.

name: UniSub LLC
description: Developer of recurring crypto payment platform designed to allow people to avail subscriptions through crypto. The company's platform integrates crypto subscriptions, that make payments automatic, so customers don't have to make a payment or manually enter their payment information, enabling businesses to accept recurring crypto payments.

name: &VOLUME LTD
description: &Volume is an AI-driven crypto management platform that trades on your behalf, adapting to market conditions and events, while you keep full control of your funds in your own account.
one_liner: &Volume is an AI-driven crypto management platform that trades on your behalf, adapting to market conditions and events, while you keep full control of your funds in your own account.

name: WinCL, Inc.
description: Developer of climate action platform designed to offset carbon emissions. The company focuses on the environmental aspects of corporate operations, including ESG management and carbon credit purchase, marketplace, and carbon information provision, helping achieve true carbon-neutral win-win cooperation between developed and developing countries.

name: Zayn Tech Pte. Ltd.
description: Zayn Network is a cutting-edge modular Layer 2 ZK Sovereign Rollup uniting Bitcoin and Ethereum's strengths, offering trustless interoperability and optimized efficiency, scalability, and security, while targeting $2.8T RWA opportunities in MENAP and Southeast Asia, supported by prominent investors like 500 Global and Cur8 Capital.

name: Melltoo Holdings Limited
description: TAKADAO offers a platform for halal takaful powered by the blockchain, creating an insurance alternative for the new, global age. For the first time, this allows Muslims from all over the world to access value aligned, transparent insurance at a never-before-possible scale.
